targets.query:
from(bucket: "anova-oven-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "door-closed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lamp-on")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vent-open")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "steam-mode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "probe-connected")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()

import "strings"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /watts$/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1000.0}))
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")

import "strings"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /watts$/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1000.0}))
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")

import "strings"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /watts$/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1000.0}))
  |> integral(unit: 1h)
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "timer-current" or r["_field"] == "timer-inital")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])
  |> last()

import "strings"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /watts$/)
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId", "_measurement"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()

import "date"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 2m, from: v.timeRangeStop), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "$tempSources")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if "${tempUnit}" == "F" then r._value * 1.8 + 32.0 else r._value}))
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /watts$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "door-closed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dry" or r["_field"] == "dryTop" or r["_field"] == "wet" or r["_field"] == "dryBottom" or r["_field"] == "probe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if "${tempUnit}" == "F" then r._value * 1.8 + 32.0 else r._value}))
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fan-speed")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fan-speed")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "relative-humidity" or r["_field"] == "relative-humidity-setpoint" or r["_field"] == "steam-percentage-setpoint")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "ovenId"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lamp-on")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vent-open")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ovenId"] == "${ovenId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "anova-oven-data",
    tag: "ovenId",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Oven ID
list.name: ovenId
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "anova-oven-data",
    tag: "ovenId",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
